doc.field: - Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 295,000 to 302,000 head versus 293,000 week ago and 309,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 123,000 to 126,000 head versus 123,000 week ago and 121,000 a year ago.
